branchCategory.name: NC(D)Q2-Z, Compact Cylinder, Double Acting, Single Rod
branchCategory.description: Standard double acting, single rod version of the NCQ2 compact cylinder. The NCQ2 is available in bore sizes from 12mm to 100mm. It comes standard with male or female piston rod threads. For mounting flexibility, it is possible to mount auto switches on any of the 4 surfaces.

breadCrumb.name: NC(D)Q2-Z, Compact, Double Acting, Single Rod
